        public static String getUserEmail​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req)
        Method to get the decoded pair email:password from authorization session attribute

        req - HttpServletRequest to get session attribute
        Returns:
        String containing the pair. Empty String if session authorization attribute not present

      • getUserRole

        public static String getUserRole​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req)
        Method to get the user role from session
        Parameters:
        req - HttpServletRequest to get session attribute
        Returns:
        String containing the role. Empty String if session authorization attribute not present

      • checkSessionEmail

        public static boolean checkSessionEmail​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req,
                                        String email)
        Method compairing a given email with the session one
        Parameters:
        req - HttpServletRequest to get session attribute
        email - email to compare
        Returns:
        true if the emails coincide, false if not.
